overview: Relive some of the greatest goals in National Hockey League history with host Denis Leary in this thrilling retrospective program that gathers all the best cup-winning shots, overtime winners, spin-o-rams, and more into one exciting compilation. Memorable scores include Wayne Gretzky's record-breaking 802nd goal and Mario Lemiuex's unbelievable goal that he shot between his legs against the Vancouver Canucks.
title: NHL: Vintage Collection: Greatest Goals
